languages.text: {n}Воин пожимает плечами.{/n} "Но я сижу в клетке, а ты разгуливаешь по их городу. Тебя они не боятся. Может, есть тому причина? Может, не так уж и схожа наша судьба?"
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fates are not the same at all?"
languages.original_text: {n}Воин пожимает плечами.{/n} "Но я сижу в клетке, а ты разгуливаешь по их городу. Тебя они не боятся. Может, есть тому причина? Может, не так уж и схожа наша судьба?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

languages.text: {n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“可我被关在笼子里，而你却在他们的城市中自由行动，他们并不惧怕你。或许这一切都是有原因的？或许我们的命运根本就不一样？”
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“可我被关在笼子里，而你却在他们的城市中自由行动，他们并不惧怕你。或许这一切都是有原因的？或许我们的命运根本就不一样？”

languages.text: {n}彼は肩をすくめた。{/n}「だが俺は檻の中にいるってのに、あんたは奴らの街を平気で歩いてる。奴らはあんたを恐れてない。俺と同じ立場だっていうのに、どう考えてもおかしいだろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は肩をすくめた。{/n}「だが俺は檻の中にいるってのに、あんたは奴らの街を平気で歩いてる。奴らはあんたを恐れてない。俺と同じ立場だっていうのに、どう考えてもおかしいだろ？」

languages.text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Sin embargo, yo estoy en una jaula mientras que usted recorre libremente su ciudad. No le temen. ¿Cree que hay un motivo para ello? ¿Por ejemplo el que nuestros destinos son muy distintos en el fondo?».
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Sin embargo, yo estoy en una jaula mientras que usted recorre libremente su ciudad. No le temen. ¿Cree que hay un motivo para ello? ¿Por ejemplo el que nuestros destinos son muy distintos en el fondo?».

languages.text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « Mais moi, je suis dans une cage, tandis que vous, vous déambulez librement dans la ville. Ils ne vous craignent pas. Il doit bien y avoir une raison à ça. Notre situation n'est peut-être pas si semblable, après tout. »
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « Mais moi, je suis dans une cage, tandis que vous, vous déambulez librement dans la ville. Ils ne vous craignent pas. Il doit bien y avoir une raison à ça. Notre situation n'est peut-être pas si semblable, après tout. »

languages.text: {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Aber ich sitze in einem Käfig, während Ihr Euch frei in ihrer Stadt bewegen könnt. Sie fürchten Euch nicht. Vielleicht gibt es dafür einen Grund? Vielleicht tragen wir überhaupt nicht dasselbe Schicksal?"
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Aber ich sitze in einem Käfig, während Ihr Euch frei in ihrer Stadt bewegen könnt. Sie fürchten Euch nicht. Vielleicht gibt es dafür einen Grund? Vielleicht tragen wir überhaupt nicht dasselbe Schicksal?"

languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fate is not the same at all?"

languages.text: {n}Omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Ama sen özgürce şehirde gezerken ben kafeste tıkılıyım. Senden korkuları yok. Belki bir sebebi vardır ha? Belki kaderlerimiz hiç de aynı değildir, ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "But I sit in a cage while you roam freely around their city. They do not fear you. Maybe there is a reason for that? Maybe our fates are not the same at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Ama sen özgürce şehirde gezerken ben kafeste oturuyorum. Senden korkuları yok. Belki de bunun bir nedeni vardır, ha? Belki kaderimiz hiç de aynı değildir?"
{n}Omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Ama sen özgürce şehirde gezerken ben kafeste oturuyorum. Senden korkuları yok. Belki de bunun bir nedeni vardır, ha? Belki kaderimiz hiç de aynı değildir?"
